Package io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics

package io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics
Core mechanics and infrastructure for agent-based modeling operations.

This package provides foundational classes that define the mechanics of agent interactions, state management, and operational abstractions used throughout the agent-based modeling framework.

Core Components

  • State - Base interface defining the essential properties and behaviors of agent states
  • Abstraction - Defines abstraction layers for modeling different levels of detail in agent behavior
  • StateMachine - Implements state transition logic for modeling agent behavior evolution
  • StateMachineContext - Provides context and environmental interactions for state machines
  • Updater - Interface for updating agent states based on model dynamics
  • ModelOperation - Defines computational operations within the modeling framework
  • StateUtils - Utility functions for state manipulation and analysis
  • PersonStateContacts - Manages contact tracing and interactions between agents

Architectural Patterns

The package follows a clean separation of concerns where:

  • State objects encapsulate agent-specific data and behaviors
  • State machines manage transitions between states
  • Operations define atomic computational steps
  • Updaters orchestrate state evolution over time

Integration Points

The mechanics package serves as the foundation layer that other packages (behavior, inhost, etc.) build upon. It provides the generic infrastructure that specialized models use to implement domain-specific logic.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.github.ai4ci.flow
    Simulation execution and data flow management for agent-based modelling.
    io.github.ai4ci.flow.builders
    Build-time and setup documentation for the model builder components in io.github.ai4ci.abm.builders.
    io.github.ai4ci.flow.output
    Writers, exporters and related types for simulation output.
  • Class
    Description
    ModelOperation
    Utility class for defining custom model operations that can be used in the Updater to create custom update stages for outbreaks and people.
    ModelOperation.BiFunction<A,B,R>
    BiFunction is not used in the current implementation but is provided for potential future use cases where a two-parameter function might be needed.
    ModelOperation.OutbreakStateUpdater
    An Update stage processor for outbreaks.
    ModelOperation.PersonStateUpdater
    An Update stage processor for people.
    ModelOperation.TriConsumer<A,B,C>
    Functional interfaces for the selector and consumer functions used in update stages.
    ModelOperation.TriFunction<A,B,C,R>
    TriFunction is defined for potential future use cases where a three-parameter function might be needed.
    ModelOperation.UpdateStage<FACTORY,INPUT>
    An abstract update stage comprises of a selector which allows you to filter the input, using getSelector, then process the input using getConsumer..
    PersonStateContacts
    This is a temporary data structure that gets generated during the update cycle to hold all the contact and exposures before they are written to the individual PersonHistory entries in the model.
    State<BUILDER,HISTORY,STATE,X extends State<BUILDER,HISTORY,STATE,X>>
    This abstraction lets us have policy and behaviour models sharing the same state model framework, so outbreak and person updates can follow the same pattern.
    State.BehaviourState
    Marks a state model as being a component of a behaviour relevant to people within the simulation
    State.PolicyState
    Marks a state model state as being a component of a policy for managing to the outbreak simulation as a whole
    StateMachine
    A generic state machine implementation for managing transitions between different behavioral and policy states in agent-based models.
    StateMachineContext
    Context tracking for state machine operations, providing state management and branching support.
    StateUtils
    Utility methods for state transitions, behavior modifications, and testing logic within the agent-based modeling framework.
    StateUtils.DefaultNoTesting
    Interface for behavior states that require no testing or history updates.
    StateUtils.DoesPCRIfSymptomatic
    Interface for behavior states that perform PCR testing when symptomatic.
    Updater
    The updater is the main handler of the update cycle.
